OUTLINE : Patients assign 1 2 group . STRATUM I ( initially resectable tumor ) : Patients undergo radiotherapy daily ( QD ) 5 day week approximately 6-7 week . Patients also receive gefitinib orally ( PO ) QD 12 month STRATUM II ( initially unresectable tumor ) : Patients undergo radiotherapy QD 5 day week approximately 6-7 week . Patients also receive concurrent gefitinib PO QD 6-7 week . Patients undergo surgery . After surgery , patient receive gefitinib PO QD 12 month . After completion study treatment , patient follow 5 year .
